Settings Arrangement

I wanted to provide a bit of explanation as to the structure of the wiki pages here in the settings department. This will help with people adding to them, as well as people who are simply reading them to get a feel for what we are all about.

The first thing you will notice is that when applicable, many of the pages are divided into two categories, Past and Future. Due to the different time periods where the game takes place, this is necessary to differentiate how things are different in the time periods. Keep this in mind while reading, and also when putting together new pages. If something would be different in the two different times be sure to note the differences by dividing the sections.

For discussion regarding settings, please join #peragro-settings on irc.freenode.net

There is more but I'll add on to this later.
